summary.title: My Summary
summary.data: A pixel-perfect front-end developer with 8 years of UI/UX experience and a passion for responsive website design. A firm believer in the mobile-first approach, I implemented a new responsive website strategy that increased mobile traffic by 20%.

objectives.title: My Objectives
objectives.data: I am a motivated and diligent developer who continuously seeks to push boundaries and explore new technologies. I thrive on acquiring new knowledge and skills.

list.position: Senior Front-End Developer | Web Application Lead (Feb 2023)
responsibilities: Developing interactive advertisements with microsites for streaming platforms including Disney+, Hulu, Discovery+, and NBCU.

Creating and maintaining a JavaScript SDK for the NBCU/Peacock streaming app using the Lightning JS canvas framework. Ensuring seamless integration and functionality across various platforms such as iOS, Android, Android TV, Fire TV, Nintendo, PlayStation, Xbox, Tizen TV, and more.

Designing and implementing a PERN stack-based platform for automated ad deployment, allowing partners to deploy full advertisements with a single button press by uploading assets. Utilizing AWS for efficient asset management and deployment.
Developing a UXP plugin for Photoshop to streamline asset export from PSD files, including video and font file handling. This plugin integrates with the previously mentioned ad deployment platform.
list.achievements: Successfully ensured cross-platform compatibility for a diverse range of devices, contributing to a unified and engaging user experience across OTT platforms and gaming consoles.

responsibilities: Developed and deployed websites, mobile applications, and landing pages from initial concept through to final launch.
Implemented a responsive, mobile-first approach that standardized output and enhanced user experience.
Evaluated UX and UI designs for technical feasibility and provided solutions to optimize performance.
Debugged and refined code to ensure high-quality, bug-free websites.
Created standard and custom reports in graphical formats as required.
Collaborated with product teams to introduce and develop new features.
Transitioned to Fullstack Developer from 2017 to 2020, utilizing the PERN stack to build dynamic e-commerce websites.
list.achievements: Successfully increased mobile traffic by 20% through the implementation of a new responsive, mobile-first strategy.

responsibilities: Led client meetings to understand and translate their vision into actionable design concepts.
Conducted brainstorming sessions to develop impactful and innovative designs.
Created detailed wireframes to organize and structure application sections effectively.
Initiated and guided the design process using Adobe Creative Suite products.
list.achievements: Enhanced application aesthetics and usability by integrating the latest design trends and practices.

responsibilities: Held client consultations to capture and understand their design needs.
Participated in brainstorming sessions to generate creative design solutions.
Designed brand identities and corporate materials, ensuring alignment with client objectives.
Prepared and optimized files for high-quality printing.
list.achievements: Created and developed compelling brands that contributed to increased client revenue and market presence.

whyMe.title: Why Me?
whyMe.description:
With my design background.



  • Years of Designing experience.
  • Years of Web Development experience.
  • 3D skills in 3ds Max, Blender & ZBrush.
  • Great internet researcher.


I'm currently focusing on full stack development, three.js, GSAP as I use my creativity and Knowledge that I gathered in the previous years and combine it into one solid combination that cannot be ignored.



Best regards,

Charbel Saad
